section.title: Hear Your AI Spa Assistant in Action
section.description: Listen to real conversations showcasing how our AI handles various spa and wellness scenarios with natural, professional communication.

voice_demos.title: Appointment Booking
voice_demos.description: AI handles a new client booking a relaxation massage

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Serenity Spa. I'm Sarah, your virtual assistant. How may I help you today?

transcript.speaker: Client
transcript.text: Hi, I'd like to book a massage appointment for this weekend.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: I'd be happy to help you book a massage. We have Swedish, deep tissue, hot stone, and aromatherapy massages available. Do you have a preference?

transcript.speaker: Client
transcript.text: What would you recommend for stress relief?

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: For stress relief, I'd recommend our aromatherapy massage with lavender essential oils. It's 60 minutes for 280 AED and perfect for relaxation. I have availability Saturday at 2 PM or Sunday at 11 AM.

voice_demos.title: Treatment Information
voice_demos.description: Client asking about facial treatments and packages

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Good morning! This is Wellness Oasis Spa. How can I assist you today?

transcript.speaker: Client
transcript.text: I'm interested in your facial treatments. What do you offer for anti-aging?

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: We have several excellent anti-aging options! Our signature Gold Collagen Facial is very popular - it includes deep cleansing, collagen mask, and LED light therapy for 420 AED. We also offer our Vitamin C Brightening Facial for 350 AED.

transcript.speaker: Client
transcript.text: Do you have any package deals?

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Yes! Our 'Glow & Relax' package combines the Gold Collagen Facial with a 30-minute relaxation massage for only 580 AED - you save 120 AED compared to booking separately.

voice_demos.title: Appointment Confirmation
voice_demos.description: AI confirming and providing pre-treatment instructions

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Hello Mrs. Ahmed, this is Sarah from Serenity Spa calling to confirm your hot stone massage appointment tomorrow at 3 PM with therapist Layla.

transcript.speaker: Client
transcript.text: Yes, that's confirmed. Anything I need to prepare?

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Perfect! Please arrive 15 minutes early for check-in. Avoid heavy meals 2 hours before your treatment, and let us know if you have any new health conditions. We'll provide robes and slippers. Looking forward to seeing you!

voice_demos.title: Health Screening
voice_demos.description: AI conducting health assessment for new client

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Before we book your deep tissue massage, I need to ask a few quick health questions to ensure your safety and comfort.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Do you have any injuries, chronic pain, or are you taking any medications? Also, is this your first deep tissue massage?

transcript.speaker: Client
transcript.text: I have some lower back tension from desk work, but no injuries. And yes, it's my first time.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Perfect! I'll note that for your therapist. They'll start gently and adjust pressure based on your comfort. Deep tissue is excellent for desk-related tension. Let's book you with our specialist, Amira.
